1a1('bum): / 'bum nga pa bzhugs so//
1b1('bum): @#/ shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ glegs bam bzhi pa/ bam po dang po// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
1b2('bum): bu/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sdon gyi mthar so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
1b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so//
1b4('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa pa'i phyir/
1b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
2a1('bum): so/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid pa'i
2a2('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// dran pa nye bar
2a3('bum): gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
2a4('bum): so/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dran pa nye bar
2a5('bum): gzhag pa pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa dang / dran pa nye par gzhag pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha'
2a6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dran pa nye bar
2b1('bum): gzhag pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi
2b2('bum): ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa pa gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
2b3('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa
2b4('bum): dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa
2b5('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yang dag par spong ba pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
2b6('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / yang dag par spong ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// yang dag par spong ba ngo bo
3a1('bum): nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// yang dag par spong ba pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
3a2('bum): so/ / yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// yang dag par spong ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
3a3('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// yang dag par spong ba pa'i phyir/
3a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// yang dag par spong ba dben
3a5('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe
3a6('bum): na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yang dag par spong ba pa dang / yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid dang / yang dag par spong ba dben pa dang / yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi
3a7('bum): mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ yang dag par spong ba pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag
3b1('bum): par spong ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin
3b2('bum): no/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ yang dag par spong ba pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang /
3b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
3b4('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
3b5('bum): mthar so/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
3b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang
3b7('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
4a1('bum): so/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
4a2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' /
4a3('bum): dbus te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/
4a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa pa gang yin
4a5('bum): pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang
4a6('bum): yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis du gnyis su byang do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dbang po pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
4a7('bum): so/ / dbang po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// dbang po dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// dbang po ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/
4b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// dbang po pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyir ma'i mthar so// dbang po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so//
4b2('bum): dbang po dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// dbang po ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// dbang po pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
4b3('bum): dbus su so/ / dbang po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// dbang po dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// dbang po ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/
4b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dbang po pa dang / dbang po stong pa nyid dang / dbang po dben pa dang / dbang po ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i
4b5('bum): mtha' / dbus te/ dbang po pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dbang po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dbang po dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dbang po ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
4b6('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na dbang po pa gang yin pa dang / dbang po stong pa nyid gang
4b7('bum): yin pa dang / dbang po dben pa gang yin pa dang / dbang po ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams
5a1('bum): cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bu/ stobs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon
5a2('bum): gyi mthar so/ / stobs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// stobs ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// stobs pa'i phyir/ byang chub
5a3('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ stobs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so//
5a4('bum): stobs ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// stobs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
5a5('bum): dbus su so/ / stobs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// stobs ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe
5a6('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ stobs pa dang / stobs stong pa nyid dang / stobs dben pa dang / stobs ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ stobs
5a7('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ stobs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stobs dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ stobs ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha'
5b1('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na stobs pa gang yin pa dang / stobs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / stobs dben pa
5b2('bum): gang yin pa dang / stobs ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de
5b3('bum): gnyis su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub kyi yan lag pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon
5b4('bum): gyi mthar so/ / byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so//
5b5('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i
5b6('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// byang chub kyi yan lag pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
5b7('bum): dpa' dbus su so/ / byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// byang
6a1('bum): chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub kyi yan lag pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid dang /
6a2('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid ba la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ byang chub kyi yan lag pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan
6a3('bum): lag stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
6a4('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan
6a5('bum): lag dben pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
6a6('bum): gnyis su de gnyis su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong
6a7('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo
6b1('bum): nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyi
6b2('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid pa'i
6b3('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
6b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
6b5('bum): dpa' dbus su so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
6b6('bum): brgyad pa dben pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa pa yang gzhan ma
6b7('bum): yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang
7a1('bum): chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam
7a2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ngo bo nyid
7a3('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe
7a4('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phags pa'i bden pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so//
7a5('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// 'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// 'phags
7a6('bum): pa'i bden pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// 'phags pa'i bden pa dben
7a7('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// 'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// 'phags pa'i bden pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub
7b1('bum): sems dpa' dbus su so/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so//
7b2('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phags pa'i bden pa pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid dang /
7b3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' mi / dbus mi te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/
7b4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/
7b5('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa med pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa stong
7b6('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang
7b7('bum): yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam gtan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// bsam
8a1('bum): gtan stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// bsam gtan dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// bsam gtan ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/
8a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// bsam gtan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
8a3('bum): so/ / bsam gtan dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// bsam gtan ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// bsam gtan pa'i phyir/ byang
8a4('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su so/ / bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// bsam gtan dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// bsam
8a5('bum): gtan ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam gtan pa dang / bsam gtan stong pa nyid dang / bsam gtan dben pa dang /
8a6('bum): bsam gtan ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ bsam gtan pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan
8a7('bum): dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang
8b1('bum): gzhan ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na bsam gtan pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang
8b2('bum): chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshad pa pa'i phyir/
8b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// tshad med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// tshad pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so//
8b4('bum): tshad pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// tshad pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// tshad pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems
8b5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' mi so/ / tshad pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// tshad pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// tshad
8b6('bum): pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// tshad pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// tshad pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus
8b7('bum): su so/ / tshad pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshad pa pa dang / tshad pa stong pa nyid dang / tshad
9a1('bum): pa dben pa dang / tshad pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi / dbus te/ tshad pa ba yang gzhan ma yin/ tshad pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
9a2('bum): ma yin/ tshad pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshad pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus
9a3('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na tshad pa pa gang yin pa dang / tshad med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshad pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshad pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa
9a4('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa
9a5('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
9a6('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug
9a7('bum): pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so//
9b1('bum): gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so//
9b2('bum): gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// gzugs
9b3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// gzugs pa'i snyoms
9b4('bum): par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
9b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ gzugs pa'i
9b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
9b7('bum): 'jug pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de
10a1('bum): ltar na gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs pa'i
10a2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe
10a3('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par thar pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rnam par thar pa
10a4('bum): dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rnam par thar pa
10a5('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rnam par thar pa
10a6('bum): ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rnam par thar pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems
10a7('bum): dpa' dbus su so/ / rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so//
10b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par thar pa pa dang / rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa dben pa dang / rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i
10b2('bum): mtha' / dbus te/ rnam par thar pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid
10b3('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
10b4('bum): de ltar na/ rnam par thar pa pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub
10b5('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mthar
10b6('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
10b7('bum): mthar so/ / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid pa'i
11a1('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// mthar kyis
11a2('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
11a3('bum): so/ / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub
11a4('bum): sems dpa' dbus su so/ / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben
11a5('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
11a6('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa dang /
11a7('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/
11b1('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid
11b2('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
11b3('bum): de ltar na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa pa gang yin pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa
11b4('bum): gang yin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin
11b5('bum): pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa pa'i phyir/
11b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// rnam
11b7('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
12a1('bum): pa dang / smon pa pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa ba pa'i
12a2('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so//
12a3('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang
12a4('bum): smon pa pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
12a5('bum): dpa' dbus su so/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// rnam par thar pa'i
12a6('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa
12a7('bum): ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa
12b1('bum): pa pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dben pa dang / rnam par
12b2('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' mi / dbus te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
12b3('bum): ba dang / smon pa pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
12b4('bum): pa dang / smon pa pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/
12b5('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
12b6('bum): pa pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa
12b7('bum): pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa
13a1('bum): dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mngon par shes pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
13a2('bum): sngon gyi mthar so/ / mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
13a3('bum): so/ / mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// mngon par shes pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// mngon par shes pa
13a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/
13a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// mngon par shes pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
13a6('bum): so/ / mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i
13a7('bum): phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mngon par shes pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / mngon par shes pa dben pa dang / mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' /
13b1('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ mngon par shes pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mngon par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mngon par shes pa ngo
13b2('bum): bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
13b3('bum): bu/ de ltar na mngon par shes pa pa gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang
13b4('bum): chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
13b5('bum): bu/ ting nge 'dzin pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir/
13b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// ting nge 'dzin pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
13b7('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi so/ / ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// ting
14a1('bum): nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// ting nge 'dzin pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid
14a2('bum): kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
14a3('bum): so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ting nge 'dzin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin dben pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' /
14a4('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi / dbus te/ ting nge 'dzin pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid
14a5('bum): ba yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
14a6('bum): de ltar na ting nge 'dzin pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dben pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin
14a7('bum): pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzungs kyi sgo
14b1('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
14b2('bum): mthar so/ / gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// gzungs kyi sgo pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// gzungs kyi sgo
14b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub
14b4('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / gzungs kyi sgo pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so//
14b5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
14b6('bum): dwa ti'i bu/ gzungs kyi sgo pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid dang / gzungs kyi sgo dben pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/
14b7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang
15a1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na gzungs kyi sgo pa gang yin pa dang /
15a2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo dben pa gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
15a3('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
15a4('bum): mthar so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
15a5('bum): mthar so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
15a6('bum): phyi ma'i mthar so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
15a7('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs pa'i phyir/ byang chub
15b1('bum): sems dpa' dbus su so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
15b2('bum): dbus su mi so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
15b3('bum): ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus
15b4('bum): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs pa yang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs
15b5('bum): pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
15b6('bum): dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
15b7('bum): pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su
16a1('bum): byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'jigs pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
16a2('bum): sngon gyi mthar so/ / 'jigs pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// mi
16a3('bum): 'jigs pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// 'jigs pa dben pa'i phyir/
16a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// 'jigs pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus
16a5('bum): su mi so/ / 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// mi 'jigs pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// mi 'jigs pa
16a6('bum): ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'jigs pa pa dang / 'jigs pa stong pa nyid dang / mi 'jigs pa
16a7('bum): dben pa dang / mi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ 'jigs pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyang
16b1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma
16b2('bum): yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na 'jigs pa pa gang yin pa dang / 'jigs pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'jigs pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /
16b3('bum): 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis
16b4('bum): su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ so so yang dag par rig pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
16b5('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / so so yang dag par rig pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
16b6('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub
16b7('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub
17a1('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / so so yang dag par rig pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang
17a2('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su so/ / so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
17a3('bum): dpa' dbus su so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ so so yang dag par rig pa pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa dang /
17a4('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus mi te/ so so yang dag par rig pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa
17a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha'
17a6('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa pa gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag
17a7('bum): par rig pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
17b1('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ snying rje chen po pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
17b2('bum): sngon gyi mthar so/ / snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// snying
17b3('bum): rje chen po ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so/ / snying rje chen po med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
17b4('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
17b5('bum): so/ / snying rje chen po pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
17b6('bum): dbus su so/ / snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ snying rje chen po pa dang / snying rje chen po stong pa nyid dang /
17b7('bum): snying rje chen po dben pa dang / snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus mi te/ snying rje chen po pa yang gzhan ma yin/ snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
18a1('bum): snying rje chen po dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang
18a2('bum): gzhan ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na snying rje chen po pa gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po dben pa gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang /
18a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sangs rgyas
18a4('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
18a5('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
18a6('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir/
18a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
18b1('bum): dpa' dbus su so/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus dbus su so//
18b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
18b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa pa yang
18b4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang
18b5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
18b6('bum): 'dres pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa
18b7('bum): dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang chos kyi dbyings pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
19a1('bum): so/ / chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/
19a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// chos kyi dbyings pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so//
19a3('bum): chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// chos kyi dbyings pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
19a4('bum): dpa' dbus su so/ / chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/
19a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos kyi dbyings pa dang / chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dben pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi
19a6('bum): / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ chos kyi dbyings pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma
19a7('bum): yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na chos kyi dbyings pa gang yin pa dang / chos kyi
19b1('bum): dbyings stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dben pa gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus
19b2('bum): gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
19b3('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// de bzhin
19b4('bum): nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
19b5('bum): so/ / de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// de bzhin nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
19b6('bum): sems dpa' dbus su so/ / de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
19b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin nyid pa dang / de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dben pa dang / de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te
20a1('bum): de bzhin nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin//
20a2('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na de bzhin nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin
20a3('bum): nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de
20a4('bum): gnyis su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang yang dag pa'i mtha' pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
20a5('bum): mi so/ / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// yang dag pa'i mtha'
20a6('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
20a7('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// yang dag pa'i mtha' pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so//
20b1('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
20b2('bum): dpa' dbus su mi so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yang dag pa'i mtha' pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid pa la sngon
20b3('bum): gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/
20b4('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan
20b5('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na yang dag pa'i mtha' pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa
20b6('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
20b7('bum): bu/ gzhan yang bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
21a1('bum): so/ / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
21a2('bum): sngon gyi mthar so/ / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
21a3('bum): so/ / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
21a4('bum): so/ / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// bsam gyis mi
21a5('bum): khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su dmigs so// bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
21a6('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings pa dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid pa la
21a7('bum): sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gyis
21b1('bum): khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma
21b2('bum): yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na bsam gyis khyab pa'i dbyings pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis khyab pa'i
21b3('bum): dbyings dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang
21b4('bum): yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang nyan thos pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
21b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// nyan thos dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// nyan thos ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
21b6('bum): so/ / nyan thos pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// nyan thos dben pa'i
21b7('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// nyan thos ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// nyan thos pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
22a1('bum): so/ / nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// nyan thos dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// nyan thos ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/
22a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nyan thos pa dang / nyan thos stong pa nyid dang / nyan thos dben pa dang / nyan thos ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi / phyi ma'i mtha'
22a3('bum): / dbus te/ nyan thos pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha'
22a4('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na nyan thos pa gang yin pa dang / nyan thos stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nyan thos dben pa gang yin pa dang / nyan thos ngo bo nyid pa
22a5('bum): gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang
22a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
22a7('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// rang sangs rgyas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rang
22b1('bum): sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
22b2('bum): phyi ma'i mthar so/ / rang sangs rgyas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i
22b3('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang sangs rgyas pa
22b4('bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dben pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ rang sangs rgyas pa yang
22b5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi
22b6('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rang sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
22b7('bum): rang sangs rgyas dben pa gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de
23a1('bum): thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa
23a2('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi so// byang chub sems dpa' dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
23a3('bum): mthar so/ / byang chub sems dpa' pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// byang chub sems
23a4('bum): dpa' dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub
23a5('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so/ / byang chub sems dpa' pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// byang chub
23a6('bum): sems dpa' ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid dang / byang chub sems
23a7('bum): dpa' dben pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ byang chub sems dpa' pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyang
23b1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
23b2('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dben pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang /
23b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa
23b4('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar so// thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon
23b5('bum): gyi mthar so/ / thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar dmigs so// thams cad mkhyen pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// thams cad
23b6('bum): mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid
23b7('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// thams cad mkhyen pa pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems
24a1('bum): dpa' dbus su mi so/ / thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so//
24a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ thams cad mkhyen pa pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid pa la sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i
24a3('bum): mtha' / dbus te/ thams cad mkhyen pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid
24a4('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na thams
24a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa pa gang yin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang
24a6('bum): yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su de gnyis su byar do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems
24a7('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar so/ / byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar so// byang chub sems dpa' dbus su so// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
24b1('bum): brgya pa/ bam po gnyis pa// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang yang 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir na/ gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas
24b2('bum): par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni/ sngon gyi mtha' /
24b3('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gzugs
24b4('bum): kyi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am/ dbus so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs kun tu mtha' yas
24b5('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir na/ tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes
24b6('bum): zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshor ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus
24b7('bum): te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' /
25a1('bum): dbus te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
25a2('bum): dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ / gang yang 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir na/ 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa
25a3('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du shes ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha'
25a4('bum): yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'du shes kyi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus
25a5('bum): te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang
25a6('bum): 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir na/ 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i
25a7('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes du brjod do//
25b1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'du byed kyi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus mi so// tshe
25b2('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir na/ rnam par shes pa kun tu
25b3('bum): mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
25b4('bum): dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
25b5('bum): de bzhin du rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus so// tshe dang ldan
25b6('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir na/ kun tu mtha' yas
25b7('bum): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'/ kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam
26a1('bum): mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
26a2('bum): dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du mig stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
26a3('bum): rnam grangs des na/ kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir na/ rna ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
26a4('bum): kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i
26a5('bum): mtha' / dbus te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rna ba'i
26a6('bum): sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am/ dbus so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rna ba kun
26a7('bum): tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir na/ sna kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par
26b1('bum): bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i
26b2('bum): phyir/ nam mkha' zhes du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sna'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus so//
26b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ sna kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ lce kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun
26b4('bum): tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus
26b5('bum): te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ lce'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus
26b6('bum): te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ lce kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i
26b7('bum): phyir na/ lus kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni
27a1('bum): sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du lus stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ lus
27a2('bum): kyi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ lus kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub
27a3('bum): sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ / gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ yid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid ni nam
27a4('bum): mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes du brjod do// tshe dang ldan
27a5('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du yid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des
27a6('bum): na/ yid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/
27a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha'
27b1('bum): zhes du brjod do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
27b2('bum): ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ sgra kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig
27b3('bum): par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sgra ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas
27b4('bum): pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du sgra stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sgra'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus so//
27b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ sgra kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ dri kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
27b6('bum): mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dri ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/
27b7('bum): mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du dri stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ dri'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'
28a1('bum): 'am dbus so/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ dri kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ ro kun tu mtha' yas pa'i
28a2('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ro ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus
28a3('bum): te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du ro stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ ro'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ stong pa
28a4('bum): nyid la mtha' 'am dbus so/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ ro kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ reg kun tu mtha' yas pa'i
28a5('bum): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ reg ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha'
28a6('bum): / dbus te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du reg stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ reg gi sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus
28a7('bum): te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ reg kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i
28b1('bum): phyir na/ chos kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha'
28b2('bum): / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du chos stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ chos kyi sngon gyi mtha' /
28b3('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ chos kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par
28b4('bum): bya'o/ / gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ gi rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gi rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam
28b5('bum): pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes du brjod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
28b6('bum): de bzhin du gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gi rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' / phyi ma'i mtha' / dbus te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
28b7('bum): rnam grangs des na/ gi rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub
