153a4('bum): lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de stobs rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na
153a5('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/
153a6('bum): de'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma lags
153a7('bum): te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha
153b1('bum): dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma
153b2('bum): lags te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma
153b3('bum): lags te/ de'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de bas ma gtan rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na
153b4('bum): bsam gtan rnams dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du bsam
153b5('bum): gtan rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de bsam gtan rnams ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das tshad pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de tshad pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na tshad pa rnams dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su
153b6('bum): bgyir ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du tshad pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de tshad pa rnams ma lags so//
153b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su
154a1('bum): bgyir ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa
154a2('bum): gang lags pa de gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de rnam par thar pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na rnam par thar pa rnams dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis
154a3('bum): su bgyir ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de rnam par thar pa rnams
154a4('bum): ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang
154a5('bum): ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
154a6('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de rnam par thar pa'i sgo
154a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ma lags te/ de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
154b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
154b2('bum): mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma
154b3('bum): mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags so//
154b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ting nge 'dzin rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa
154b5('bum): ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ting nge 'dzin rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de gzungs kyi
154b6('bum): sgo rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/
154b7('bum): de'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na de bzhin
155a1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma
155a2('bum): lags te/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'jigs pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de 'jigs pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na
155a3('bum): 'jigs pa rnams dang / ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du 'jigs pa
155a4('bum): rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de 'jigs pa rnams ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / ma
155a5('bum): skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ma
155a6('bum): skyes pa gang lags pa de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das byams pa chen po'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de byams pa chen po ma lags te/ de ltar na byams pa chen po dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su
155a7('bum): bgyir ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du byams pa chen po'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de byams pa chen po ma lags so//
155b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de snying rje chen po ma lags te/ de ltar na snying rje chen po dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma
155b2('bum): lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du snying rje chen po'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de snying rje chen po ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos
155b3('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags
155b4('bum): tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de de bzhin nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na de
155b5('bum): bzhin nyid dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du de bzhin nyid
155b6('bum): kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de de bzhin nyid ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das chos nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de chos nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na chos nyid dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
155b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du chos nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de chos nyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi ma skyes pa gang
156a1('bum): lags pa de/ chos kyi dbyings ma lags te/ de ltar na chos kyi dbyings dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags
156a2('bum): mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du chos kyi dbyings kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de chos kyi dbyings ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos skyon pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de chos skyon pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na chos skyon pa nyid dang
156a3('bum): ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du chos skyon pa nyid kyi ma
156a4('bum): skyes pa gang lags pa de chos skyon pa nyid ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags te/ de ltar na yang dag pa'i mtha' dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir
156a5('bum): ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du yang dag pa'i mtha'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags so//
156a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ma lags te/ de ltar na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
156a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das thams
156b1('bum): cad shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de thams cad shes pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na thams cad shes pa nyid dang ma skyes ba de gnyis su mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig
156b2('bum): lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de thams cad shes pa nyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de lam gyi rnam pa shes
156b3('bum): nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma
156b4('bum): lags te/ de'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar
156b5('bum): na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma skyes pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar ma skyes pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du
156b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags so/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu pa// bcom ldan 'das gzugs
156b7('bum): kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags te/ de ltar na gzugs dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags
157a1('bum): tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni tshor ba ma lags te/ de ltar na tshor ba dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su

157a3('bum): 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni 'du shes ma lags te/ de ltar na 'du shes dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa
157a4('bum): ma lags te/ de'i slad du 'du shes kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de 'du shes ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni 'du byed ma lags te/ de ltar na 'du byed dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so//
157a5('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du 'du byed kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de 'du byed ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa
157a6('bum): gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba

157b2('bum): gang lags pa de ni rna ba ma lags te/ de ltar na rna ba dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/

157b5('bum): te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du lce'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de lce ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das lus kyi

158a6('bum): so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du ro'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ro ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das reg gi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni reg ma lags te/ de ltar na reg

160b1('bum): gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang

160b3('bum): gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
160b4('bum): kyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma lags te/ de ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom

161a1('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das sa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sa'i khams ma lags te/ de ltar na sa'i khams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i
161a2('bum): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du sa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sa'i khams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das chu'i khams kyi

165b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dngos po pa stong pa nyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong
165b7('bum): pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags
166a1('bum): gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags
166a2('bum): pa de ni dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma
166a3('bum): lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang
166a4('bum): lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags
166a5('bum): gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi bgrib pa gang lags pa de ni yang
166a6('bum): dag par spong ba rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na yang dag par spong ba rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma
166a7('bum): lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de yang dag par spong ba rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma lags
166b1('bum): te/ de ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du rdzu
166b2('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dbang po rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na dbang po rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su
166b3('bum): bgyir ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du dbang po rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dbang po rnams ma lags so// bcom
166b4('bum): ldan 'das stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni stobs rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na stobs rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma
166b5('bum): lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de stobs rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
166b6('bum): ma lags te/ de ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma
166b7('bum): lags te/ de'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma lags
167a1('bum): te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma
167a2('bum): lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni 'phags pa'i
167a3('bum): bden pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags
167a4('bum): tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gtan rnams ma lags te/ de ltar
167a5('bum): na bsam gtan rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du bsam
167a6('bum): gtan rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de bsam gtan rnams ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ tshad med pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na tshad pa rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma
167a7('bum): mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du tshad med pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de tshad med pa rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
167b1('bum): gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so//
167b2('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
167b3('bum): rnams ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par thar pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na rnam par thar pa rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
167b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du rnam par thar pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de rnam par thar pa rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das mthar kyis gnas pa'i
167b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe
167b6('bum): na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma
167b7('bum): lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa ma lags te/ de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo
168a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma

168a3('bum): ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
168a4('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams
168a5('bum): kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis
168a6('bum): ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ting nge 'dzin rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma lags te/ de ltar
168a7('bum): na gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo
168b1('bum): rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
168b2('bum): dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs

168b5('bum): 'jigs pa rnams ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis
168b6('bum): su bgyir ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de so so yang dag
168b7('bum): par rig pa rnams ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das byams pa chen po'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni byams pa chen po ma lags te/ de ltar na byams pa chen po dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du
169a1('bum): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du byams pa chen po'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de byams pa chen po ma lags so// bcom
169a2('bum): ldan 'das snying rje chen po'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni snying rje chen po ma lags te/ de ltar na snying rje chen po dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig
169a3('bum): ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du snying rje chen po'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de snying rje chen po ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi
169a4('bum): chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ma lags te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma
169a5('bum): lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni thams
169a6('bum): cad shes pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na thams cad shes pa nyid dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma

169b1('bum): pa nyid dang 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
169b2('bum): nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'grib
169b3('bum): pa de gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags gnyis ma lags mang ba ma lags tha dad pa ma lags te/ de'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib
169b4('bum): pa gang lags pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags so/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu gcig pa// bcom ldan 'das gang yang gzugs zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis
169b5('bum): shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang 'du shes zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i
169b6('bum): chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang 'du byed ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos
169b7('bum): kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang rna ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o//
170a1('bum): gang sna zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang lce zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang lus zhes bgyi ba
170a2('bum): 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang yid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang gzugs zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis
170a3('bum): shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang sgra zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang dri zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi
170a4('bum): grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang ro zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang reg ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang chos
170a5('bum): zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang gi rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang rna ba'i rnam par
170a6('bum): shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang lce'i rnam par
170a7('bum): shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang yid kyi rnam par
170b1('bum): shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
170b2('bum): zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes
170b3('bum): bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes
170b4('bum): bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang rna ba'i
170b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs
170b6('bum): su bgyis pa'o/ / gang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing
170b7('bum): nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang sa'i khams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma
171a1('bum): mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang chu'i khams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam ba ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang khams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis
171a2('bum): su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang rlung gi khams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang nam mkha'i khams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis
171a3('bum): shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang ma rig pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing
171a4('bum): nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang 'du byed ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i
171a5('bum): chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang ming dang gzugs zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang skye mched drug ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi
171a6('bum): grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang reg pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang tshor ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o//
171a7('bum): gang sred pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang len pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang srid pa zhes bgyi ba 'di
171b1('bum): ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang skye ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang rga shi zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa
171b2('bum): ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis
171b3('bum): su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes
171b4('bum): bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang shes rab
171b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang nang stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang phyi stong
171b6('bum): pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang stong pa nyid stong pa
171b7('bum): nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang chen po stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang don dam pa
172a1('bum): stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o//
172a2('bum): gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o//
172a3('bum): gang thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o//
172a4('bum): gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang
172a5('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang
172a6('bum): dngos po pa stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang
172a7('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis
172b1('bum): pa'o/ / gang yang dag par spong ba rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis
172b2('bum): pa'o/ / gang dbang po rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang stobs rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang byang chub
172b3('bum): kyi yan lag rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o//
172b4('bum): gang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang bsam gtan rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang tshad
172b5('bum): pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang rnam
172b6('bum): par thar pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o//
172b7('bum): gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma
173a1('bum): mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing
173a2('bum): nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma
173a3('bum): mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang byams pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni
173a4('bum): gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang snying rje chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ces bgyi
173a5('bum): ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang thams cad shes pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// gang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
173a6('bum): ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o/ / gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing nyam pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi grangs su bgyis pa'o// //
173a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bcu gnyis so// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
173b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos 'di dag la ni ji ltar yongs su rtog/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' ni gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang / yongs su brtag pa ni gang / de skad ces smras pa dang tshe dang
173b2('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhes zer ba ni/ gang gi phyir sems can/ byang chub yin pa de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o//
173b3('bum): byang chub des kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te/ chos de dag la mngon par chags pa do// chos gang gi rnam pa shes zhe na/ gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon bar chags
173b4('bum): pa med do/ / 'du shes kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// 'du byed kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// gi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon
173b5('bum): par chags pa do/ / rna ba'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// sna'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// lce'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// lus kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa
173b6('bum): do/ / yid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// sgra'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mgon par chags pa do// dri'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// ro'i
173b7('bum): rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// reg gi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// chos kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// rna ba'i
174a1('bum): rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa med do// lus kyi
174a2('bum): rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
174a3('bum): rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon
174a4('bum): par chags pa do/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rnam pa
174a5('bum): shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// lus kyi 'dus te reg
174a6('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// sa'i khams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// chu'i khams kyi rnam
174a7('bum): pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa med do// me'i khams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// rlung gi khams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// nam mkha'i khams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon
174b1('bum): par chags pa do/ / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// ma rig pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// 'du byed kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// rnam par shes
174b2('bum): pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// dang gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// skye mched drug gi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// reg pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa med
174b3('bum): do/ / tshor ba'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa med do// sred pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa med do// len pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// srid pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// skye ba'i
174b4('bum): rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// rga shi'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par
174b5('bum): chags pa do/ / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa med do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa
174b6('bum): do/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// nang stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa med do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa med do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/
174b7('bum): de la mngon par chags pa da// stong nyid stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te// de la mngon par chags pa do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa med do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa med do//
175a1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags
175a2('bum): pa do/ / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do//
175a3('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa med do// pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// dngos po
175a4('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa med do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// dran pa nye bar gzhag
175a5('bum): pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// dbang po rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/
175a6('bum): de la mngon par chags pa do// stobs rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon
175a7('bum): par chags pa do/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// bsam gtan rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// tshad pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa
175b1('bum): do/ / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon
175b2('bum): par chags pa do/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rnam
175b3('bum): pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// 'jigs pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/
175b4('bum): de la mngon par chags pa do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// byams pa chen po'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do// snying rje chen po'i rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa do//
175b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la mngon par chags pa med do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rnam pa gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa gang dang / tshul gang dang /
175b6('bum): mtshan ma gang gis chos rnams rnam pa yod par bya ba ste/ 'di ltar 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sam gzugs sam/ sgra'am dri'am/ ro'am/ reg gam/ phyi nang gi chos kyang shes te/ rnam pa gang dang tshul gang dang / mtshan ma gang gis rnam pa
175b7('bum): yod par bya ba/ 'di dag ni chos thams cad kyi rnam pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ring du song ba
176a1('bum): ste/ ci'i phyir ring du song ba zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ phung po rnams las ring du song bas na/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// khams rnams las ring du song bas na de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// skye mched rnams las ring du
176a2('bum): song bas na/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// nyon mongs pa thams cad las ring du song bas na/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad las ring du song bas na de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// 'gro ba drug las ring du song bas na/ de'i
176a3('bum): phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song bas na/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song bas na/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las ring
176a4('bum): du song bas na/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song bas na/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song bas na/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// shes

181b4('bum): yongs su rtog go/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang /
181b5('bum): stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ yid
181b6('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba dang / rtag ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/
181b7('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ gi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ gi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su

197b6('bum): su rtog go/ mngon par shes pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / sdug ces bya bar yongs su rtog go/ mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya bar yongs su rtog go/ mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /

203a2('bum): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin//
203a3('bum): 'jigs pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'jigs pa rnams ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin/ byams pa chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ byams pa chen po ma
203a4('bum): yin/ snying rje chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ snying rje chen po ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/
203a5('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/
203a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin/ zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzugs ma yin te/ skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi ma

207a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de brtson 'grus kyi
207b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam

207b4('bum): kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa

207b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ stong pa nyid
207b7('bum): stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang
208a1('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de chen po
208a2('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ don dam pa stong pa

208a7('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ thog ma dang tha ma
208b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dor ba pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba do// tshe dang ldan
208b2('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dor ba pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin
208b3('bum): te skye ba do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/

218a5('bum): yin/ yid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang yid ma yin/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang gzugs ma yin/ sgra'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang sgra ma yin/ dri'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang dri ma yin/ ro'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang ro ma yin/ reg
218a6('bum): gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang reg ma yin/ chos kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang chos ma yin/ gi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang gi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rna ba'i rnam par shes
218a7('bum): pa ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang lus kyi rnam par

218b2('bum): te reg pa ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa

218b6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ sa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang sa'i khams ma yin/ chu'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang chu'i khams ma yin/ khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang khams ma yin/ rlung gi
218b7('bum): khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rlung gi khams ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang nam mkha'i khams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ ma rig pa'i
219a1('bum): 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang ma rig pa ma yin/ 'du byed kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ dang gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang
219a2('bum): dang gzugs ma yin/ skye mched drug gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang skye mched drug ma yin/ reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang regs ma yin/ tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang tshor ba ma yin/ sred pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang sred pa ma yin/
219a3('bum): len pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang len pa ma yin/ srid pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang srid pa ma yin/ skye ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang skye ba ma yin/ rga shi'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rga shi ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
219a4('bum): 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu

219a6('bum): phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang phyi stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa
219a7('bum): gang yin pa de yang phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang chen po stong pa nyid ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa
219b1('bum): gang yin pa de yang don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa
219b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang dor ba

219b5('bum): kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
219b6('bum): ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang dbang po rnams ma yin/
219b7('bum): stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang stobs rnams ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang 'phags pa'i lam yan
220a1('bum): lag brgyad pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang bsam gtan rnams ma yin/ tshad pa rnams kyi 'grib pa
220a2('bum): gang yin pa de yang tshad pa rnams ma yin/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin/

220a6('bum): yang 'jigs pa rnams ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin/ byams pa chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang byams pa chen po ma yin/ snying rje chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin
220a7('bum): pa de yang snying rje chen po ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes
220b1('bum): pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du/ gang 'di gzugs zhes

223a1('bum): cad shes pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ / gang 'di lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// gang 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su
223a2('bum): pa'i grangs su byas pa'o zhes zer/ / rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang gzugs/ gzugs nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha
223a3('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar tshor ba yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang tshor ba/ tshor ba nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha
223a4('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di tshor ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar 'du shes kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'du shes/ 'du shes nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang
223a5('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di 'du shes zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar 'du byed kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'du byed/ 'du byed nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/
223a6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di 'du byed ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/ rnam par
223a7('bum): shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang
223b1('bum): / nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar rna ba yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rna ba/ rna ba nyid kyang
223b2('bum): ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rna ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar sna yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang sna/ sna nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang
223b3('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di sna zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar lce yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang lce/ lce nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
223b4('bum): rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di lce zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar lus kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang lus/ lus nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des
223b5('bum): na/ gang 'di lus zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar yid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang yid/ yid nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/

223b7('bum): 'di gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ / 'di ltar sgra yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang sgra/ sgra nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di sgra zhes bya ba
224a1('bum): de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ / 'di ltar dri yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dri/ dri nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di dri zhes
