227a7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
227b1('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di tshul khrims kyi pha
227b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ / 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
227b3('bum): kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang
227b4('bum): gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su
227b5('bum): pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ / 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha
227b6('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
227b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu
228a1('bum): phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bco lnga pa// 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid/ nang stong pa nyid kyang ma
228a2('bum): skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa
228a3('bum): nyid/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/
228a4('bum): ma skyes pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
228a5('bum): ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i
228a6('bum): grangs su byas pa'o/ / 'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di chen po
228a7('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ / 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang
228b1('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa
228b2('bum): nyid/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa
228b3('bum): yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas
228b4('bum): pa'o/ / 'di ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
228b5('bum): grangs des na/ gang 'di mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma
228b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar dor ba pa stong pa
228b7('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dor ba pa stong pa nyid/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni
229a1('bum): gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ / 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
229a2('bum): dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid
229a3('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
229a4('bum): ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis
229a5('bum): su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ / 'di ltar pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang pa stong pa nyid/ pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
229a6('bum): ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dngos po pa stong
229a7('bum): pa nyid/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di dngos po pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
229b1('bum): ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas
229b2('bum): pa'o/ / 'di ltar dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan
229b3('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes
229b4('bum): pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar
229b5('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di yang dag par
229b6('bum): spong ba rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ / 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang ma skyes
229b7('bum): pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar dbang po rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dbang
230a1('bum): po rnams/ dbang po rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di dbang po rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma
230a2('bum): skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang stobs rnams/ stobs rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di stobs rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan
230a3('bum): lag rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
230a4('bum): zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ / 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
230a5('bum): lag brgyad pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma
230a6('bum): skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs
230a7('bum): su byas pa'o/ / 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams/ bsam gtan rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di bsam
230b1('bum): gtan rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ / 'di ltar tshad pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams/ tshad med pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
230b2('bum): dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di tshad pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang gzugs
230b3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs
230b4('bum): su byas pa'o/ / 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di
230b5('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ / 'di ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
230b6('bum): pa rnams/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//
230b7('bum): 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa/ rnam
231a1('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa
231a2('bum): pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ / 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang
231a3('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang ting nge
231a4('bum): 'dzin rnams/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes
231a5('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di
231a6('bum): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
231a7('bum): rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang 'jigs pa
231b1('bum): rnams/ 'jigs pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di 'jigs pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/
231b2('bum): ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhes bya
231b3('bum): ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ / 'di ltar byams pa chen po yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po/ byams pa chen po nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
231b4('bum): rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di byams pa chen po zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar snying rje chen po yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang ma
231b5('bum): skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di snying rje chen po zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma
231b6('bum): skyes pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i
231b7('bum): grangs su byas pa'o/ / 'di ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
232a1('bum): rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa
232a2('bum): nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o//
232a3('bum): 'di ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/
232a4('bum): gang 'di phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang ma
232a5('bum): skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar rang byang chub kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rang byang
232a6('bum): chub/ rang byang chub nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di rang byang chub ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang
232a7('bum): gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gang 'di lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas
232b1('bum): pa'o/ / 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam
232b2('bum): grangs des na/ gang 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su pa'i grangs su byas pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
232b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar yongs su rtog pa de'i tshe/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gzugs kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar
232b4('bum): 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ 'du shes kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/
232b5('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rna ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sna'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/
232b6('bum): lce'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lus kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gzugs kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar
232b7('bum): 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sgra'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dri'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ ro'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/
233a1('bum): reg gi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ chos kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
233a2('bum): slad du/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu
233a3('bum): rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa
233a4('bum): mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lce'i 'dus te
233a5('bum): reg pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
233a6('bum): slad du/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis

238b4('bum): phyir 'ong bas ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir lam bsgoms/ phyir 'ong bas ni/ dam pa ma yin pa'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgoms/ dgra bcom pas ni bla ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba rnams
238b5('bum): spang ba'i phyir lam bsgoms/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pas ni/ rang byang chub kyi don du lam bsgoms/ ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can rnams kyi don du de ltar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar byed
238b6('bum): cing dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod/ ci'i phyir na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ ci'i phyir na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ de skad ces
238b7('bum): smras pa dang / / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni chos ma skyes pa la 'thob pa yod pa dang / khong du chud pa yod par 'dod de/ ma skyes pa la rgyun
239a1('bum): tu zhugs pa yod par 'dod do/ / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par 'dod do// ma skyes pa la lan cig phyir 'ong ba yod par 'dod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do// ma skyes pa la phyir mi
239a2('bum): 'ong ba yod par mi 'dod do/ / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod par 'dod do// ma skyes pa la dgra bcom pa yod par 'dod do// dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bya ba yod par 'dod do// ma skyes pa la rang sangs rgyas yod par 'dod do// rang byang
239a3('bum): chub yod par 'dod do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod pa yod par yang 'dod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dka' ba spyod pa'i 'du shes kyis spyod do/
239a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes bskyed na/ sems can tshad grangs pa'i don bya bar nus kyi/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems can rnams la mar 'du shes bskyed pa dang phar 'du shes bskyed pa dang
239a5('bum): bur 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes bskyed pas/ sems can grangs tshad pa'i don bya ba de yang pa'i tshul du nus par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ ji ltar bdag bdag
239a6('bum): ces bya ba yang de ni thams cad du thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad du thams cad cing pa/ de bzhin du phyi nang gi chos rnams la yang 'du shes bskyed de/ de ltar 'du shes bskyed kyang dka' ba'i 'du shes mi bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
239a7('bum): ltar de ni chos gang la yang len pa'i phyir ro/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ma skyes pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa yod par mi 'dod/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod par 'dod do/ de bzhin gshegs
239b1('bum): bas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ltar na ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa'am/ 'thob par bya ba do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod chos skyes pas 'thob pa/ ma skyes pa 'thob par bya bar 'dod dam/ 'on tam ma skyes pa'i chos kyis thob pa skyes
239b2('bum): pa 'thob par 'dod/ / rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni skyes pa'i chos kyis kyang 'thob par bya ba ma skyes pa 'thob par mi 'dod do// ma skyes pa'i chos kyis kyang thob pa skyes pa 'thob par 'dod do// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
239b3('bum): pa rab 'byor 'o na 'thob pa la mngon par rtogs pa dam/ / rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'thob pa yang yod/ mngon par rtogs pa yang yod de/ gnyis kyis ma yin gyi/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'thob
239b4('bum): pa'am mngon par rtogs pa ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa'o/ / rgyun tu zhugs pa'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'am/ phyir 'ong ba'am/ dgra bcom pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sangs rgyas dag kyang
239b5('bum): 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa ste/ don dam pas ni 'thob pa'am/ mngon par rtogs pa'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'am/ phyir 'ong ba'am/ dgra bcom pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/

239b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ ji ltar thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa de bzhin du 'gro ba lnga dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du tha dad kyi don dam par ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

243b7('bum): bdag ni rna ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sna skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lce skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do//
244a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lus skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzugs
244a2('bum): skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sgra skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dri skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

244a4('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gi rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

244a6('bum): par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gi 'dus te reg pa skyes pa

244b1('bum): 'dod do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang
244b2('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan

245a1('bum): bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ma rig pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'du byed skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod

245a3('bum): bu/ bdag ni skye mched drug skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni reg pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshor ba skyes pa rang bzhin gyis

245a6('bum): pa skye bar 'dod do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye
245a7('bum): bar mi 'dod do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye

245b6('bum): 'dod do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dor ba pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod

246a1('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni pa stong pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar

246a4('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
246a5('bum): dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dbang po rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni stobs rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni byang chub kyi yan lag
246a6('bum): rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
246a7('bum): skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni bsam gtan rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni tshad med pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa
246b1('bum): skye bar 'dod do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par thar ba rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar
246b2('bum): 'dod do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
246b3('bum): smon pa pa skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye par 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni mngon par shes pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams skyes pa rang
246b4('bum): bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong
246b5('bum): pa skye bar 'dod do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni 'jigs pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod
246b6('bum): do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni byams pa chen po skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni snying rje chen po skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
246b7('bum): ti'i bu/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
247a1('bum): ti'i bu/ bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang
247a2('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rang byang chub skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni lam gyi
247a3('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skyes pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa skye bar 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
247a4('bum): 'byor skye ba skye'am/ 'on tam mi skye ba skye// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye ba yang mi skye/ mi skye ba yang mi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar skye ba gang yin pa dang / skye ba pa gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis
247a5('bum): ka yang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs pa bltar pa thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa dag go/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar rnam grangs des na skye ba yang mi skye mi skye ba yang mi
247a6('bum): skye'o/ / sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos zhes bya ba brjod par khyod kyis spobs na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa la'ang brjod du spobs par 'gyur ram// rab 'byor
247a7('bum): kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos zhes bya ba brjod par khyod kyis spobs so zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos zhes bya ba brjod pa la bdag gis spobs pa
247b1('bum): do/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba pa yang bdag gis ni brjod par spobs pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar ma skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / skye ba med pa gang
247b2('bum): yin pa dang / spobs pa gang yin pa dang / brjod pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs pa bltar med pa thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med
247b3('bum): par mtshan nyid gcig pa dag go/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor brjod pa ni skye ba ces bya ba yin te/ spobs pa yang skye ba med la chos kyang skye ba de/ gang las brtsams shing brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa yin nam/
247b4('bum): rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ brjod pa ni ma skyes pa'o// spobs pa ni ma skyes pa'o// chos ni ma skyes pa'o// gang las brtsams te smra bar spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang ma skyes pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
247b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs skye ba do// tshor ba skye ba med do// 'du shes skye ba med do// 'du byed skye ba do// rnam par shes pa skye ba med do// skye ba do// rna ba skye ba do// sna skye ba med do// lce skye ba do//
247b6('bum): lus skye ba do// yid skye ba do// gzugs skye ba do// sgra skye ba do// dri skye ba do// ro skye ba do// reg skye ba do// chos skye ba do// gi rnam par shes pa skye ba do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa skye ba do// sna'i rnam par
247b7('bum): shes pa skye ba do/ / lce'i rnam par shes pa skye ba do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa skye ba do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye ba do// gi 'dus te reg pa skye ba do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa skye ba do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa skye ba
248a1('bum): do/ / lce'i 'dus te reg pa skye ba med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa skye ba med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa skye ba do// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skye ba do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skye ba med
248a2('bum): do/ / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skye ba med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skye ba do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skye ba do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba skye ba do// sa'i khams skye ba
248a3('bum): do/ / chu'i khams skye ba do// khams skye ba med do// rlung gi khams skye ba do// nam mkha'i khams skye ba med do// rnam par shes pa'i khams skye ba do// ma rig pa skye ba do// 'du byed skye ba do// rnam par shes pa skye ba do//
248a4('bum): dang gzugs skye ba do// skye mched drug skye ba do// reg pa skye ba med do// tshor ba skye ba do// sred pa skye ba do// len pa skye ba do// srid pa skye ba do// skye ba skye ba do// rga shi skye ba do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba do//
248a5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba do// nang stong pa nyid skye ba do//
248a6('bum): phyi stong pa nyid skye ba do// phyi nang stong pa nyid skye ba med do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid skye ba do// chen po stong pa nyid skye ba do// don dam pa stong pa nyid skye ba do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid skye ba do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid skye ba do// mtha' las
248a7('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid skye ba do/ / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid skye ba do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid skye ba do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid skye ba med do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid skye ba med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid skye ba do//
248b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid skye ba do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid skye ba do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skye ba do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skye ba do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams skye ba do// yang dag par spong ba rnams
248b2('bum): skye ba do/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams skye ba do// dbang po rnams skye ba do// stobs rnams skye ba med do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams skye ba do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skye ba med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams skye
248b3('bum): ba do/ / bsam gtan rnams skye ba do// tshad pa rnams skye ba do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skye ba do// rnam par thar pa rnams skye ba do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skye ba med do// rnam
248b4('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa skye ba do// mngon par shes pa rnams skye ba do// ting nge 'dzin rnams skye ba do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams skye ba do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams skye ba do//
248b5('bum): 'jigs pa rnams skye ba do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams skye ba do// byams pa chen po skye ba do// snying rje chen po skye ba do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skye ba med do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skye ba do// lan cig phyir
248b6('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skye ba do/ / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu skye ba do// dgra bcom pa nyid skye ba do// rang byang chub skye ba do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid skye ba do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye ba do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs
248b7('bum): des na/ brjod pa ni skye ba pa ste/ spobs pa yang skye ba la chos kyang skye ba do/ gang las brtsams shing brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa'o// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni chos smra ba'i nang na mchog tu bya bar 'os pa ste/ de ci'i
249a1('bum): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gang dang gang yongs su dris pa de dang de la thogs pa med do// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos chos thams cad la gnas pa pa
249a2('bum): dag gi chos nyid de de dag ni gang dang gang yongs su dris pa de dang de la thogs pa med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thamas cad gnas pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na chos thams cad gnas pa yin// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/
